alert.note: Alert for Ventura (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 14 at 10:05AM PST until December 14 at 1:45PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest California, including the following area, Ventura County. * WHEN...Until 100 PM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1002 AM PST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated brief heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 6 inches of rain have fallen with highest amounts occurring in the mountains. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Oxnard, Thousand Oaks, Simi Valley, Ventura, Camarillo, Fillmore, Ojai, Chatsworth, Moorpark, Santa Paula, Newbury Park, and Oak Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
